data.message: It's Not talking about the Contents :) it's talking about the Development Stack and Architecture.
It's more powerful in Storing Persistent data when you do it correctly.
The lead developer's name is hilarious given the context :D

Amr Eldib Not really, no. Ironically enough, the adult-entertainment industry is amongst the leading technology sectors in the world. The industry is behind _a lot_ of the technology innovations we're enjoying today from video streaming to e-commerce, live chat and online payments. 

On a business aspect, they've introduced affiliate marketing,

They were and remain the largest driving force behind the propagation and adaptation of cable and DSL connections, recently the 3G/4G. We should also thank them for their tireless efforts in growing the internet's bandwidth.

Last but not least, they do have websites ranked amongst the top 50 most visited websites on the internet. All in all, we can disagree with the industry's line of business, purpose and existence but we shouldn't dismiss their contributions.
They are also pioneers in data sciences fields! Check Pornhub's devs blog!
